**Texas Economic Development & Tourism 2023 Governor’s Small Business Summits!!**

Check the [Texas Economic Development website](https://lnks.gd/l/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..MIj3oB1I6qQxP-zAHC3U9Spbcaa9wrY2U3HWgcL1D2E/s/495344278/br/153727172320-l) for information on locations, speakers and registration information for the *2023 Governor’s Small Business Summits*, as well as additional events and webinars.

[![](https://www.cityofrobstown.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Crossroads-District-Flyer-120720.jpg)](https://www.cityofrobstown.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Crossroads-District-Flyer-120720.jpg)

**Robstown Improvement Development Corporation****(RIDC)** is a non-profit corporation aimed at providing economic development efforts in the City of Robstown. The corporation manages the 4B-Sales tax, and is governed by a Board of Directors consisting of seven board members and an Executive Director.

P O Box 872  
Robstown, Texas 78380  
Phone (361) 387-4589

[![](https://www.cityofrobstown.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/PortCC-2016-logo-hor-300x50.jpg)](https://portofcc.com/)

**RIDC Board Members:**

Mayor David Martinez, Member

County Commissioner John Marez, Member

Roland Ramos, Member

Mary Ann Saenz, Member

Nelda Sanchez, Member

Cordelia Bosquez, Member

Omar Garcia, Member

Gabby Garcia, Executive Director
